WorkItem.Description: Instead or in addition to the strength gems, agility gems should take place in the default gemming templates. Agility turns out to be much more powerful than strength (at least until patch 3.2.2 and the Touched by the light change, where this has to be re-evaluated).

Comments.Message:
I would also be keen to see Vivid Eye of Zul added to the default template.  Being Hit capped seems to be just as useful as being def capped. :)

My current gem template uses the following (and combinations there of):
Red: Nightmare Tear, Shifting and Sovereign
Yellow: Enduring and Vivid
Blue and Prismatic: Solid.. say no more
Meta: the standard def and stam gems.

To speed up things, here are the gem IDs:

Red: Tear (49110 epic, 42702 rare), Shifting agility (40130 epic, 40023 rare), Regal dodge (40138 epic, 40031 rare), Defender's parry (40139 epic, 40032 rare)[, Sovereign strength (40129 epic, 40022 rare)]
Yellow: Enduring defense (40167 epic, 40089 rare), Vivid hit (40166 epic, 40088 rare)
Blue: Solid (40119 epic, 40008 rare)

No one really puts strength gems any longer into their prot gear. But just in cast, I put the strength gems into [].
Duplicate of http://rawr.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=14454, gems have since been updated
